title: wrong region prepaid card
body:
i have purchased a prepaid 10 USD
i didnt check at the time
yet i only play at euw
can u exchange it for me or another solution ?
the fast reponse is needed since its related to an already bought card and the my shop feature

replies.body:
Hey! 

I'm going to c/p my reply to your other comment for visibility! 

The quick FAQ for prepaid casrd issues can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/categories/115001242827). 

If you're not able to find a resolution to your problems there, you'll need to [open a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so player support can access your account and help you. Unfortunately, I don't personally have access to accounts. 

I'm unsure about exchanging content, as the cards are region locked, but support would know much more.

your forum is so complicated 
even the support page seemed confusing i didnt get where to click to contact
